title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: Why Robert Kiyosaki Sees BTC as Superior to Gold in Crisis
summary: Bitcoin trades steady at $118K after hitting $124K highs. Robert Kiyosaki warns of a stock market crash, favoring BTC over gold as a superior safe haven. The post Bitcoin Price Analysis: Why Robert Kiyosaki Sees BTC as Superior to Gold in Crisis appeared first on Cryptonews .
